member.name: T:Diamond.Core.Clonable.DiamondClonableException
member.summary: This is an abstract class the defines the base object for all exceptions in the Diamond.Core.Repositry library. This allows exceptions specific to this library to be caught separately than other exceptions.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.DiamondClonableException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.DiamondClonableException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.DiamondClonableException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.DiamondClonableException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: T:Diamond.Core.Clonable.IObjectCloneFactory
member.summary: Defines an interface for a factory that can clone objects.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.IObjectCloneFactory.CloneInstance(System.ICloneable)
member.summary: Creates a deep clone of an object.
member.returns: The new object that s a deep clone of instance.

member.summary: Creates a deep clone of an object.
member.typeparam: The type of the instance to clone.
